name: Lucid9: Inciting Incident
description: Lucid9 is a visual novel focused on a web of intricate mysteries set in the fictional 2018 metropolis of Isamu. Lucid9: Inciting Incident is the first part of the story, focused on a string of disappearances that occur at a prestigious, uppity boarding academy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.66 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space
